abstract: The Washington Post Company announced Monday afternoon that it was selling Newsweek to Sidney Harman, a 91-year-old stereo equipment magnate, in a move that will end of a half-century of the company’s ownership of the magazine.
snippet: The Washington Post Company announced Monday afternoon that it was selling Newsweek to Sidney Harman, a 91-year-old stereo equipment magnate, in a move that will end of a half-century of the company’s ownership of the magazine.
lead_paragraph: 5:22 p.m. | Updated  From Media Decoder with more on Business Day:

headline.main: It’s a Done Deal: Newsweek Is Sold to Harman
